code:
sequenceDiagram
  participant PE as PrequentialEvaluator
  participant ST as Stream
  participant CL as Classifier
  participant EV as PerformanceEvaluator

  loop enquanto PE.processed < max_instances
    PE->>ST: next_instance(CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
    ST-->>PE: inst (CloudNative_HelmChart)

    PE->>CL: get_votes_for_instance(CloudNative_HelmChart)
    CL-->>PE: votes

    PE->>EV: add_result(CloudNative_Serverless)

    PE->>CL: train_on_instance(CloudNative_HelmChart)

    alt processed % sample_frequency == 0
        PE->>PE: curve.push(CloudNative_Serverless)
    end

      alt processed % mem_check_frequency == 0
        PE->>CL: get_model_measurements(CloudNative_HelmChart)
        CL-->>PE: Vec<Measurement>
        PE->>PE: ram_hours += â€¦
      end
    end

  PE->>PE: curve.export(CloudNative_Serverless)
repo_description: A MOA-inspired project to optimize Naive Bayes and Hoeffding Trees algorithms with a rust implementation.
